a.description: The DNS A record returned by the lookup.

ns.description: The DNS NS record returned by the lookup.

rev.description: The DNS PTR record returned by the lookup.

aaaa.description: The DNS AAAA record returned by the lookup.

rev6.description: The DNS PTR record returned by the lookup of an IPv6 address.

cname.description: The DNS CNAME record returned by the lookup.

mx.description: The DNS MX record returned by the lookup.

soa.description: The domain queried for its SOA record.

txt.description: The DNS TXT record returned by the lookup.
